document.full_text: a philadelphia woman who said she was molested by an employee dressed as donald duck while at walt disney world in 2008 has settled her lawsuit with the theme park company.
document.title: disney settles donald duck groping allegations
lines_and_colors: a philadelphia woman who said she was molested by an employee dressed as donald duck while at walt disney world in 2008 has settled her lawsuit with the theme park company.
